jobs.context: When my problem was not resolved and I was asked for detailed feedback on the interaction
jobs.motivation: I want to easily continue the chat and keep browsing at the same time
jobs.outcome: So that I don't have to memorize instructions, and switch back and forth between instructions and the website.

jobs.context: When I get wordy instructions within a conversation and the topic is quite complex and largely unknown to me
jobs.motivation: I want to be quickly directed to the corresponding pages I need to act upon
jobs.outcome: So that I can act upon instructions quickly and get back to what I was doing.

jobs.context: When I act upon chatbot instructions
jobs.motivation: I want to follow instructions one step at a time
jobs.outcome: So I can focus on solving my problem first.

jobs.context: When I get irrelevant/inaccurate responses through a chatbot
jobs.motivation: I want to get a relevant and personalized response as soon as possible
jobs.outcome: So I don't spend too much time searching for specific pages.

jobs.context: When I open a chat window
jobs.motivation: I don't want to give any feedback
jobs.outcome: So that I can feel confident about the response and act upon it.
